title: Build letsconnect.love - Dating Platform (NerdyCupid API)
description:
Create letsconnect.love as a dating/connection platform powered by the NerdyCupid.ai Scientific Matching API.

## Features
1. **Scientific Matching** - Powered by NerdyCupid.ai API
   - Big Five Personality matching
   - Lifestyle compatibility
   - Intimate compatibility
   - Financial compatibility
   - Values and interests alignment
2. **User Profiles** - Photos, bio, preferences
3. **AI Insights** - Compatibility explanations, conversation starters
4. **Messaging** - In-app messaging for matches
5. **Discovery** - Browse and filter potential matches
6. **Premium Features** - Advanced filters, unlimited likes, AI analysis

## Tech Stack
- Next.js frontend
- NerdyCupid.ai API (https://api.nerdycupid.ai/api/v2)
- PostgreSQL for user data
- Stripe for subscriptions

## API Integration
- POST /api/v2/match - Calculate compatibility
- POST /api/v2/match/find - Find matches
- POST /api/v2/profiles - Create profiles
- POST /api/v2/match/analyze - Deep AI analysis

## Target Domain
- letsconnect.love

## Related
- nerdycupid.ai (API provider)
- lonely.fyi (social connection platform)
